txt.en: Culhuc would like for you to taste his newest dish.
Culhuc is waiting to hear your thoughts about his dish.\n\nTalk to Culhuc in Lhan Garan.
Culhuc is in Lhan Garan, near the oven along the water-front path.\n\nSample the roast next to Culhuc in Lhan Garan.
'I prepared a simple roast for you! You did, after all, procure the meat for me. I'd be curious to hear your thoughts on the dish.'
'Tasty but a little tough to chew? I thought so too. I'm sure my next attempt will yield better results. I'm glad I asked you to gather so much meat!'
